Farm Activities

Heriloom Seeds

We conserve the heirloom seeds, and maintain the genetic purity of the seed. We are intrested in learning more about sampradhaya seeds available and conserve them as much as we can.

Read more

Morphology

Morphology is required for future generations to identify the seed by looking at few external structural parameters of any seeds growth. We are learning from the different sources available from universities. Yet a lot to learn in this area, we put all our efforts to remove the future conflicts beteen seed identification.

Nutritional Properties

Heirlooms are the gifted seeds by nature, by default the nutritions given

Agriculture tool

Farmer way of living with traditional Wisdom, independent of mechanization from any type of imports, We are the live example of a self-sustained family with all the agriculture tools available to do day-to-day tasks.

Read more
